home.welcome: Make shopping lists and track easily how much you'll spend.
home.reception: Log in to manage your lists.

register.title: Sign up to make your own lists.
register.preferredLocaleComment: Even if there were no translation for the selected language, this preference will be used to correctly format currencies and other elements.
register.passwordComment: Password must be 8 to 72 characters long, and contains at least one lowercase, one uppercase, one number and one special character.
register.mandatoryFieldsComment: All fields with an * are mandatories.
